name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add New Tab To Current Group

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension adds a new tab to the tab group you are currently working from.

If you have a lot of tabs open and you useâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension adds a new tab to the tab group you are currently working from.

If you have a lot of tabs open and you use tab groups to organize them, you would find that if you want to use a new tab in the group you are working from, the + sign only creates a new tab at the end of the tab bar outside your current tab group. You then have to drag that new tab over to the group you were working from.

With this chrome extension, you can create a new tab and it automatically gets added to the group you are working from, moves the new tab to the left of your current tab and makes the new tab the new active tab.
